data.message:
(y) YAYYYY!  Just from its introduction, I'm already loving Graph Search.  I so get it!  It's all about connecting with people you love with love (Aloha).  Big MAHALO to Mark Zuckerberg and all of you on the Facebook team! 

Early adopters, check it out and sign up at the bottom of this link to sign up on the waiting list to beta test it. I did.  I just can't wait for this to be launched: https://www.facebook.com/about/graphsearch
